summary.span: 存储一组整数，共四个，表示一个矩形的位置和大小。

span.span: Stores a set of four integers that represent the location and size of a rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 矩形由 属性表示的、和左上角定义 。A rectangle is defined by its , , and upper-left corner represented by the property. 若要绘制矩形，需要 对象和 对象。To draw rectangles, you need a object and a object. 对象提供 方法，而 对象存储行的功能，如颜色和宽度。The object provides the method, and the object stores features of the line, such as color and width. 绘制矩形的单位由 用于绘制的图形对象的和属性确定。The units the rectangle is drawn in is determined by the and properties of the graphics object used for drawing. 默认单位是像素。The default unit is pixels. 若要绘制 填充的颜色，需要 对象和派生自的对象， 例如 或 。To draw a filled with color, you need a object and an object derived from such as or . 对象提供 方法， 对象提供颜色和填充信息。The object provides the method and the object provides the color and fill information. 对于更高级的形状，请使用 对象。For more advanced shapes, use a object. ## Examples 下面的示例在 (10，10) 绘制其左上角的矩形。The following example draws a rectangle with its upper-left corner at (10, 10). 矩形的宽度为100，高度为50。The rectangle has a width of 100 and a height of 50. 传递给构造函数的第二个参数 指示钢笔宽度为5像素。The second argument passed to the constructor indicates that the pen width is 5 pixels. 绘制矩形时，笔位于矩形边界上。When the rectangle is drawn, the pen is centered on the rectangle's boundary. 由于笔宽度为5，矩形的边将绘制5个像素宽，这样，在边界本身绘制1个像素，在内部绘制2个像素，在外部绘制2个像素。Because the pen width is 5, the sides of the rectangle are drawn 5 pixels wide, such that 1 pixel is drawn on the boundary itself, 2 pixels are drawn on the inside, and 2 pixels are drawn on the outside. 有关笔对齐的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：设置笔宽度和对齐方式](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-set-pen-width-and-alignment)。For more details on pen alignment, see [How to: Set Pen Width and Alignment](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-set-pen-width-and-alignment). 下图显示了生成的矩形。The following illustration shows the resulting rectangle. 虚线显示画笔的宽度为1个像素时应绘制的矩形的位置。The dotted lines show where the rectangle would have been drawn if the pen width had been one pixel. 矩形左上角的放大视图显示黑色黑色线条在这些点线上居中。The enlarged view of the upper-left corner of the rectangle shows that the thick black lines are centered on those dotted lines. ![笔](~/add/media/pens1.gif "笔")![Pens](~/add/media/pens1.gif "Pens") 该示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.UsingAPen#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingAPen/CS/Class1.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.UsingAPen#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingAPen/VB/Class1.vb#21)]

summary.span: 将此 放大指定量。

span.span: Enlarges this by the specified amount.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会放大此矩形，而不是它的副本。This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it. 矩形沿轴沿两个方向放大。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果 50 x 50 矩形由 x 轴中的50放大，则生成的矩形将为150单位长 (原始的50、处于减号方向的50和在加号方向的 50) 保持矩形的几何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center. ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码将创建一个 ，并将其放大两个轴中的50单位。The code creates a and enlarges it by 50 units in both axes. 在 (黑色) 上，并在通货膨胀 (红色) 后，将该矩形绘制到屏幕上。The rectangle is drawn to screen before inflation (black) and after inflation (red). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会放大此矩形，而不是它的副本。This method enlarges this rectangle, not a copy of it. 矩形沿轴沿两个方向放大。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果 50 x 50 矩形由 x 轴中的50放大，则生成的矩形将为150单位长 (原始的50、处于减号方向的50和在加号方向的 50) 保持矩形的几何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center. 如果 `x` 或 `y` 为负，则 结构在相应方向上是伸缩的。If either `x` or `y` is negative, the structure is deflated in the corresponding direction. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 结构，并将其在 x 轴方向放大100个单位：The following example creates a structure and enlarges it by 100 units in the x-axis direction: [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建的副本 `rect` ，将副本放大，然后返回放大的副本。This method makes a copy of `rect`, enlarges the copy, and then returns the enlarged copy. 矩形沿轴沿两个方向放大。The rectangle is enlarged in both directions along an axis. 例如，如果 50 x 50 矩形由 x 轴中的50放大，则生成的矩形将为150单位长 (原始的50、处于减号方向的50和在加号方向的 50) 保持矩形的几何中心。For example, if a 50 by 50 rectangle is enlarged by 50 in the x-axis, the resultant rectangle will be 150 units long (the original 50, the 50 in the minus direction, and the 50 in the plus direction) maintaining the rectangle's geometric center. ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` 事件处理程序的参数。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 此代码将创建一个 ，并将其放大两个轴中的50单位。The code creates a and enlarges it by 50 units in both axes. 请注意，生成的矩形 (红色) 在两个轴中都为150单位。Notice that the resulting rectangle (red) is 150 units in both axes. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRectangleExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取包含两个 结构的交集的 结构。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当两个矩形中的一个为空时，表示其所有值均为零，则该 方法将返回一个矩形，其起点为 (0，0) ，以及非空矩形的高度和宽度。When one of the two rectangles is empty, meaning all of its values are zero, the method returns a rectangle with a starting point of (0, 0), and the height and width of the non-empty rectangle. 例如，如果有两个矩形： A = (0，0;0，0) ，B = (1，1;2，2) ，则 A 和 B 的联合 (0，0;2，2) 。For example, if you have two rectangles: A = (0, 0; 0, 0) and B = (1, 1; 2, 2), then the union of A and B is (0, 0; 2, 2). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed for use with a Windows Form. 将此代码粘贴到窗体中 `ShowRectangleUnion` ，并在处理窗体事件时调用方法，并将 `e` 作为传递 。Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowRectangleUnion` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as .
